mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (userId, recordId, role, content, username) VALUES (#{userId}, #{recordId}, #{role}, #{content}, #{username})
mapper.select: SELECT c.commentId, c.userId, c.recordId, c.role, c.content, c.username, c.createTime, r.replyId, r.commentId AS r_comment_id, r.userId AS r_user_id, r.role AS r_role, r.content AS r_content, r.username AS r_username, r.replyedName as replyedName, r.createTime AS r_create_time FROM comment c LEFT JOIN reply r ON c.commentId = r.commentId WHERE c.recordId = #{recordId} ORDER BY c.createTime DESC, r.createTime ASC
